mapper.insert: insert into JMF_CONFIG_CERT (CONFIG_ID, CERT_SEQ_NO, CERTIFICATE, NOTE, LAST_DATE, CERT_SENDER, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME) values (#{configId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{certSender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update JMF_CONFIG_CERT set CERT_SEQ_NO = #{certSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERTIFICATE = #{certificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_DATE = #{lastDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CERT_SENDER = #{certSender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where CONFIG_ID = #{configId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select CONFIG_ID, CERT_SEQ_NO, CERTIFICATE, NOTE, LAST_DATE, CERT_SENDER, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME from JMF_CONFIG_CERT where CONFIG_ID = #{configId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select CONFIG_ID, CERT_SEQ_NO, CERTIFICATE, NOTE, LAST_DATE, CERT_SENDER, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME from JMF_CONFIG_CERT
